001package io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.extension;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.allure.CustomAllureListener;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.allure.StepType;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.annotation.Journey;
006import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.annotation.JourneyData;
007import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.decorators.DecoratorsFactory;
008import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.log.LogQuest;
009import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.parameters.DataForge;
010import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.parameters.PreQuestJourney;
011import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.quest.Quest;
012import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.quest.SuperQuest;
013import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.util.ObjectFormatter;
014import io.cyborgcode.utilities.reflections.ReflectionUtil;
015import io.qameta.allure.Allure;
016import java.lang.reflect.Method;
017import java.util.Arrays;
018import java.util.Comparator;
019import java.util.List;
020import java.util.Optional;
021import org.junit.jupiter.api.Order;
022import org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ExtensionContext;
023import org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.InvocationInterceptor;
024import org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ReflectiveInvocationContext;
025import org.springframework.context.ApplicationContext;
026import org.springframework.test.context.junit.jupiter.SpringExtension;
027
028import static io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.config.FrameworkConfigHolder.getFrameworkConfig;
029import static io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.storage.StorageKeysTest.PRE_ARGUMENTS;
030import static io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.storage.StoreKeys.QUEST;
031
032/**
033 * JUnit 5 {@code InvocationInterceptor} extension that processes pre-test setup
034 * for test methods annotated with {@code @PreQuest}.
035 *
036 * <p>This extension extracts all {@code @PreQuest} annotations from a test method,
037 * sorts them based on execution order, and executes the corresponding preconditions
038 * before the test runs. The preconditions are dynamically resolved and injected
039 * into the test execution context.
040 * </p>
041 *
042 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
043 */
044@Order(Integer.MAX_VALUE)
045public class Initiator implements InvocationInterceptor {
046
047   /**
048    * Intercepts test method execution to process {@code @PreQuest} preconditions.
049    *
050    * @param invocation        The invocation context of the test method.
051    * @param invocationContext Reflective context of the method.
052    * @param extensionContext  Context of the test execution.
053    * @throws Throwable If an error occurs while processing preconditions.
054    */
055   @Override
056   public void interceptTestMethod(Invocation<Void> invocation, ReflectiveInvocationContext<Method> invocationContext,
057                                   ExtensionContext extensionContext) throws Throwable {
058
059      Optional<Method> testMethod = extensionContext.getTestMethod();
060
061      if (testMethod.isPresent() && testMethod.get().getAnnotationsByType(Journey.class).length > 0) {
062         Quest quest = (Quest) extensionContext.getStore(ExtensionContext.Namespace.GLOBAL).get(QUEST);
063         if (quest == null) {
064            throw new IllegalStateException("Quest not found in the global store");
065         }
066
067         List<Journey> sortedPreQuestAnnotations = getSortedJourneys(testMethod.get());
068
069         ApplicationContext appCtx = SpringExtension.getApplicationContext(extensionContext);
070         DecoratorsFactory decoratorsFactory = appCtx.getBean(DecoratorsFactory.class);
071         SuperQuest superQuest = decoratorsFactory.decorate(quest, SuperQuest.class);
072         if (!CustomAllureListener.isStepActive(StepType.PROCESSING_PRE_QUESTS.getDisplayName())) {
073            CustomAllureListener.startStep(StepType.PROCESSING_PRE_QUESTS);
074         }
075         sortedPreQuestAnnotations.forEach(preQuest -> processPreQuest(preQuest, superQuest));
076         if (CustomAllureListener.isStepActive(StepType.PROCESSING_PRE_QUESTS.getDisplayName())) {
077            CustomAllureListener.stopStep();
078         }
079      }
080      if (!CustomAllureListener.isStepActive(StepType.TEST_EXECUTION.getDisplayName())) {
081         CustomAllureListener.startStep(StepType.TEST_EXECUTION);
082      }
083      invocation.proceed();
084   }
085
086   /**
087    * Retrieves and sorts {@code @Journey} annotations based on their execution order.
088    *
089    * @param method The test method containing {@code @Journey} annotations.
090    * @return A sorted list of {@code @Journey} annotations.
091    */
092   private List<Journey> getSortedJourneys(Method method) {
093      return Arrays.stream(method.getAnnotationsByType(Journey.class))
094            .sorted(Comparator.comparing(Journey::order))
095            .toList();
096   }
097
098   /**
099    * Processes a single {@code @Journey} annotation, resolving and executing its precondition logic.
100    *
101    * @param preQuest   The {@code @Journey} annotation representing the precondition.
102    * @param superQuest The test execution context enriched with preconditions.
103    */
104   private void processPreQuest(Journey preQuest, SuperQuest superQuest) {
105      String journey = preQuest.value();
106      JourneyData[] journeyData = preQuest.journeyData();
107
108      PreQuestJourney<?> preQuestJourney = ReflectionUtil.findEnumImplementationsOfInterface(
109            PreQuestJourney.class, journey, getFrameworkConfig().projectPackages());
110
111      Object[] processedData = Arrays.stream(journeyData)
112            .map(dataEnumStr -> processJourneyData(dataEnumStr, superQuest))
113            .toArray();
114
115      String stepName = StepType.PROCESSING_PRE_QUEST.getDisplayName() + ": " + preQuestJourney.toString();
116      CustomAllureListener.startStep(stepName);
117      String attachmentName = journey + "-Data";
118
119      String formattedData = ObjectFormatter.formatProcessedData(journeyData, processedData);
120      Allure.addAttachment(attachmentName, formattedData);
121
122      preQuestJourney.journey().accept(superQuest, processedData);
123      if (CustomAllureListener.isStepActive(stepName)) {
124         CustomAllureListener.stopStep();
125      }
126   }
127
128   /**
129    * Resolves test data for {@code @JourneyData} annotations.
130    *
131    * @param journeyData The {@code @JourneyData} annotation containing the data model reference.
132    * @param quest       The test execution context where the resolved data is stored.
133    * @return The resolved test data object.
134    */
135   private Object processJourneyData(JourneyData journeyData, SuperQuest quest) {
136      DataForge<?> dataForge = ReflectionUtil.findEnumImplementationsOfInterface(
137            DataForge.class, journeyData.value(), getFrameworkConfig().projectPackages());
138
139      Object argument;
140      if (journeyData.late()) {
141         LogQuest.extended("Creating data using late binding for: {}", journeyData.value());
142         argument = dataForge.dataCreator();
143      } else {
144         LogQuest.extended("Creating data for: {}", journeyData.value());
145         argument = dataForge.dataCreator().create();
146      }
147      quest.getStorage().sub(PRE_ARGUMENTS).put(dataForge.enumImpl(), argument);
148      return argument;
149   }
150
151}
152
153
